string.name: title
string.value: Successfully use Joy Bird Feather

string.name: desc
string.value: During the event, experience the joy of success by using Joy Bird Feathers (sold by Inkwell) and Glittering Joy Bird Feathers (dropped by Joy Birds) to exchange your Lv. 45 Maple equipment for Lv. 70 Maple equipment with potential.

string.name: title
string.value: Hunt Joy Birds

string.name: desc
string.value: Hunt 8 Joy Birds anywhere in Maple World. Pay attention to your surroundings! They could appear at any time.

string.name: title
string.value: Orange Mushroom Mount

string.name: desc
string.value: Get an Orange Mushroom Mount Coupon during the event period and you can learn to ride a mighty Orange Mushroom!

string.name: title
string.value: Potted Mini Maple Tree Cultivation

string.name: desc
string.value: Gather 8 Potted Mini Maple Trees from monsters, minerals, or plants during the event period, and use your Item Pot (Y) to raise them for their magical fruit. You can raise your harvest count by using a Golden Maple Fruit in your inventory.

string.name: title
string.value: Dance Practice

string.name: desc
string.value: Join Cygnus, Lilin, or Valerie's fan club and help them with their dance practice for 8 days. They don't have to be consecutive days. Even if you change fan clubs, your records won't be erased.

string.name: title
string.value: Vocal Training

string.name: desc
string.value: Join Cygnus, Lilin, or Valerie's fan club and help them with their vocal training for 8 days. They don't have to be consecutive days. Even if you change fan clubs, your records won't be erased.

string.name: title
string.value: Instrument Practice

string.name: desc
string.value: Join Cygnus, Lilin, or Valerie's fan club and help them with their instrument practice for 8 days. They don't have to be consecutive days. Even if you change fan clubs, your records won't be erased.

string.name: title
string.value: Moral Support

string.name: desc
string.value: Join Cygnus, Lilin, or Valerie's fan club and cheer them on for 8 days. They don't have to be consecutive days. Even if you change fan clubs, your records won't be erased.

string.name: desc
string.value: Join Cygnus, Lilin, or Valerie's fan club and help promote them for 8 days. They don't have to be consecutive days. Even if you change fan clubs, your records won't be erased.

string.name: desc
string.value: Join Cygnus, Lilin, or Valerie's fan club and help pretty them up for 8 days. They don't have to be consecutive days. Even if you change fan clubs, your records won't be erased.

string.name: desc
string.value: A talented, yet lazy songstress, participating only at her Knights' request

string.name: desc
string.value: A brilliant-eyed tomboy with a melodic voice and a mysterious past

string.name: job
string.value: Penguin Wrangler

string.name: desc
string.value: She doesn't have the best voice, but this penguin wrangler has the drive to win

string.name: title
string.value: Vocal Training

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete the You've Got Talent! quest for the Maple Admin to improve your Rising Star's vocal skills.

string.name: title
string.value: Instrument Training

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete The Challenge of Orpheus! quest for Cassandra to improve your Rising Star's instrumental skills.

string.name: title
string.value: Dance Training

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete the Shall We Dance? quest for Gaga to improve your Rising Star's dancing skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete the Celebrity Training quest for Cassandra to improve your Rising Star's beauty.

string.name: title
string.value: Fame Promotion

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete the What Do Stars Live For? quest for Gaga to improve your Rising Star's fame.

string.name: title
string.value: Reputation Management

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete The Tabloids Strike! quest for Cassandra to improve your Rising Star's reputation.
$0$Every Sunday at 2PM and 5PM,$1$ the Rising Star trio will have a $2$special concert.$4$
$0$You can meet the future Rising Star trio $7$by going to Star Hall $5$$4$via the Dimensional Mirrors.$6$$3$
$0$You can see how your Rising Star is doing every Sunday.$3$$2$

string.name: title
string.value: 3rd Day Power Added!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r3 days#k to earn #e#b200 Power Elixirs#k#n, which fully restore your HP and MP.

string.name: title
string.value: 4th Day Power Added!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r4 days#k to earn a #e#bSecret Recipe#k#n item, which gratns you 3 recipes for the Professions you've learned.

string.name: title
string.value: 5th Day Power Added!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r5 days#k to earn #e#b1 Golden Hammer#k#n, which increases a piece of equipment's available upgrades by 1. However, if a hammer fails, nothing will happen.

string.name: title
string.value: 6th Day Power Added!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r6 days#k to earn #e#b1 Nightmare Mount 10-Day Coupon#k#n, which allows you to use the Nightmare Mount skill for 10 days.

string.name: title
string.value: 7th Day Power Added!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r7 days#k to earn #e#b3 Advanced Equip Enhancement Scrolls#k#n, which further enhance fully upgraded items.

string.name: title
string.value: 8th Day Power Added!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r8 days#k to earn #e#b3 Special Potential Scrolls#k#n, which grant hidden potential to items that don't have any.

string.name: title
string.value: 9th Day Power Added!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r9 days#k to earn #e#b3 Golden Hammers#k#n, which increase a piece of equipment's available upgrades by 1. However, if a hammer fails, nothing will happen.

string.name: title
string.value: 10th Day Power Added!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r10 days#k to earn a pair of #b#eVirtue's Earrings#n#k, which requires Lv. 75 and has the following stats: #eUpgrades Available: 7, STR/DEX/INT/LUK +3, HP/MP +200\nMovement Speed/Jump +10, Avoidability/Accuracy +200, all traits +40#n.

string.name: title
string.value: Stone of Virtue Completely Charged!

string.name: desc
string.value: You charged up the Stone of Virtue for all 10 days! Unleash its awesome power and enjoy some unlimited hunting!

string.name: title
string.value: 1st Sundae Made!

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect these 3 ingredients once a day to whip up a delicious Special Sundae for the Secret Heat-Beating Recipe Book: #eSweet Syrup, Shredded Ice and Sliced Fruit.#n\r\n Make a total of 1 Special Sundae to receive #e#b100x Sundaes#k#n!

string.name: title
string.value: 2nd Sundae Made!

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect these 3 ingredients once a day to whip up a delicious Special Sundae for the Secret Heat-Beating Recipe Book: #eSweet Syrup, Shredded Ice and Sliced Fruit.#n\r\n Make a total of 2 Special Sundaes to receive a #e#bWatermelon Popsicle#k#n!

string.name: title
string.value: 3rd Sundae Made!

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect these 3 ingredients once a day to whip up a delicious Special Sundae for the Secret Heat-Beating Recipe Book: #eSweet Syrup, Shredded Ice and Sliced Fruit.#n\r\n Make a total of 3 Special Sundaes to receive #e#b100x Power Elixirs#k#n!

string.name: title
string.value: 4th Sundae Made!

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect these 3 ingredients once a day to whip up a delicious Special Sundae for the Secret Heat-Beating Recipe Book: #eSweet Syrup, Shredded Ice and Sliced Fruit.#n\r\n Make a total of 4 Special Sundaes to receive a #e#bMelon Popsicle#k#n!

string.name: title
string.value: 5th Sundae Made!

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect these 3 ingredients once a day to whip up a delicious Special Sundae for the Secret Heat-Beating Recipe Book: #eSweet Syrup, Shredded Ice and Sliced Fruit.#n\r\n Make a total of 5 Special Sundaes to receive an #e#bAdvanced Equip Enhancement Scroll#k#n!

string.name: title
string.value: 6th Sundae Made!

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect these 3 ingredients once a day to whip up a delicious Special Sundae for the Secret Heat-Beating Recipe Book: #eSweet Syrup, Shredded Ice and Sliced Fruit.#n\r\n Make a total of 6 Special Sundaes to receive a #e#bChocolate Popsicle#k#n!

string.name: title
string.value: 7th Sundae Made!

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect these 3 ingredients once a day to whip up a delicious Special Sundae for the Secret Heat-Beating Recipe Book: #eSweet Syrup, Shredded Ice and Sliced Fruit.#n\r\n Make a total of 7 Special Sundaes to receive an #e#bIce Crystal Face Paint#k#n!

string.name: title
string.value: 8th Sundae Made!

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect these 3 ingredients once a day to whip up a delicious Special Sundae for the Secret Heat-Beating Recipe Book: #eSweet Syrup, Shredded Ice and Sliced Fruit.#n\r\n Make a total of 8 Special Sundaes to receive a #e#bStrawberry Popsicle#k#n!

string.name: title
string.value: All 8 Special Sundaes Made!

string.name: desc
string.value: You've completed all 8 Special Sundaes! Now you can enjoy the rest of your summer with the joy of ice cold refreshment.

string.name: title
string.value: Treasure Map Completion 1st Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete a map by collecting #e6 pieces of the pirate's Treasure Map#n once a day to record your progress in the Treasure Map Book.\rWhen you complete a #rTreasure Map for the first time#k, you can obtain #b20 Power Elixirs#k that will restore your HP and MP.

string.name: title
string.value: Treasure Map Completion 3rd Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete a map by collecting #e6 pieces of the pirate's Treasure Map#n once a day to record your progress in the Treasure Map Book.\rWhen you complete a #rTreasure Map over 3 days#k, you can obtain #b3 Continent Transportation Scrolls#k and #b30 Power Elixirs#k that will restore your HP and MP.

string.name: title
string.value: Treasure Map Completion 5th Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete a map by collecting #e6 pieces of the pirate's Treasure Map#n once a day to record your progress in the Treasure Map Book. When you complete a #rTreasure Map over 5 days#k, you can obtain #b3 Scroll for Hand Cannon for ATT 65%#k, which has a 65% chance of giving your Hand Cannon ATT +2 and STR +1, and #b50 Power Elixirs#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Treasure Map Completion 7th Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete a map by collecting #e6 pieces of the pirate's Treasure Map#n once a day to record your progress in the Treasure Map Book.\rWhen you complete a #rTreasure Map over 7 days#k, you can obtain a #bLegendary Glided Giant#k, a special Lv. 100 weapon for Cannoneers that has ATT +107 Magic DEF +62.

string.name: title
string.value: Treasure Map Completion 7th Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: You've completed 7 days of Treasure Maps, but the adventure is only just beginning!

string.name: title
string.value: Doll Recovery Day 1!

string.name: desc
string.value: Recover one Monkey Doll a day to record your progress in the Monkey Doll Recovery Record.\r\nAs a reward for the first day, you can receive #b20 Power Elixirs#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Doll Recovery Day 3!

string.name: desc
string.value: Recover one Monkey Doll a day to record your progress in the Monkey Doll Recovery Record.\r\nAs a reward for the 3rd day, you can receive #b30 Power Elixirs#k and a #bScroll for Armor for ATT/M. ATT 15%#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Doll Recovery Day 5!

string.name: desc
string.value: Recover one Monkey Doll a day to record your progress in the Monkey Doll Recovery Record.\r\nAs a reward for the 5th day, you can receive #b50 Power Elixirs#k and a #bScroll for Gloves for ATT or M. ATT 60%#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Doll Recovery Day 7!

string.name: desc
string.value: Recover one Monkey Doll a day to record your progress in the Monkey Doll Recovery Record.\rAs a reward for the 7th day, you can receive #r3 permanent #bSpecial Potential Scrolls#k and a #bBling Bling Monkey#k that can be transferred within your account, and used by Cannoneers to decorate their monkey.

string.name: title
string.value: Participation Check completed!

string.name: desc
string.value: You've completed all 7 days! Recover a Monkey Doll every 10 minutes to receive #bMighty Bananas#k and #bMimir's Well Water for Cannoneers#k.

string.name: title
string.value: The Strawberry Juice Master

string.name: desc
string.value: During the event, hunt normal monsters and gather 50 Red Strawberries to take to Gaga. Once you make Strawberry Juice 3 times with Gaga, you'll receive #bEXP#k, as well as a chance to go for the #rMelon Juice Master#k title!

string.name: title
string.value: The Melon Juice Master

string.name: desc
string.value: During the event, hunt normal monsters and gather 50 Cool Melons to take to Gaga. Once you make Melon Juice 5 times with Gaga, you'll receive #bEXP#k, as well as a chance to go for the #rKiwi Juice Master#k title!

string.name: title
string.value: The Kiwi Juice Master

string.name: desc
string.value: During the event, hunt normal monsters and gather 50 Ripe Kiwis to take to Gaga. Once you make Kiwi Juice 7 times with Gaga, you'll receive #bEXP#k, as well as a chance to go for the #rPineapple Juice Master#k title!

string.name: title
string.value: The Pineapple Juice Master

string.name: desc
string.value: During the event, hunt normal monsters to gather 50 Fresh Pineapples to take to Gaga. Make Pineapple Juice with Gaga 10 times to receive a #rPink Beach Parasol Chair#k and #rTangy Earrings#k that have stat boosts of #bAllstat+1 and ATT/M.ATT +50#k.

string.name: title
string.value: The Strawberry Juice Master

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect #b50 x #i03994363##t03994363##k from normal monsters to make Strawberry Juice from, and bring them to Gaga.

string.name: title
string.value: The Melon Juice Master

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect #b50 #i03994364##t03994364#s#k from normal monsters to make Melon Juice, and bring them to Gaga.

string.name: title
string.value: The Kiwi Juice Master

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect #b50 #i03994365##t03994365#s#k from normal monsters to make Kiwi Juice, and bring them to Gaga.

string.name: title
string.value: The Pineapple Juice Master

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect #b50 #i03994366##t03994366#s#k from normal monsters to make Pineapple Juice, and bring them to Gaga.

string.name: title
string.value: Day 3 as an Eco Mapleteer!

string.name: desc
string.value: Charge up Cosmic Green and use the #eGoing Green skill once#n each day to stamp your Strategy Journal for that day.\r\n#rFor your Day 3 reward#k, you'll get #e#b50 Power Elixirs#k#n, which completely restore your HP and MP.

string.name: title
string.value: Day 4 as an Eco Mapleteer!

string.name: desc
string.value: Charge up Cosmic Green and use the #eGoing Green skill once#n each day to stamp your Strategy Journal for that day.\r\n#rFor your Day 4 reward#k, you'll get #e#b2 Legends Coins#k#n, which can be spent in the Legends Shop.

string.name: title
string.value: Day 5 as an Eco Mapleteer!

string.name: desc
string.value: Charge up Cosmic Green and use the #eGoing Green skill once#n each day to stamp your Strategy Journal for that day.\r\n#rFor your Day 5 reward#k, you'll get a #e#bScroll for Eye Accessory 60% for a stat#k#n, which increases a stat on an eye accessory by 2.

string.name: title
string.value: Day 6 as an Eco Mapleteer!

string.name: desc
string.value: Charge up Cosmic Green and use the #eGoing Green skill once#n each day to stamp your Strategy Journal for that day.\r\n#rFor your Day 6 reward#k, you'll get #e#b3 Legends Coins#k#n, which can be spent in the Legends Shop.

string.name: title
string.value: Day 7 as an Eco Mapleteer!

string.name: desc
string.value: Charge up Cosmic Green and use the #eGoing Green skill once#n each day to stamp your Strategy Journal for that day.\r\n#rFor your Day 7 reward#k, you'll get a #e#bScroll for Accessory for ATT/M. ATT 15%#k#n, which adds the ATT/M. ATT +1 stat to an accessory item.=

string.name: title
string.value: Day 8 as an Eco Mapleteer!

string.name: desc
string.value: Charge up Cosmic Green and use the #eGoing Green skill once#n each day to stamp your Strategy Journal for that day.\r\n#rFor your Day 8 reward#k, you'll get #e#b5 Legends Coins#k#n, which can be spent in the Legends Shop.

string.name: title
string.value: Day 9 as an Eco Mapleteer!

string.name: desc
string.value: Charge up Cosmic Green and use the #eGoing Green skill once#n each day to stamp your Strategy Journal for that day.\r\n#rFor your Day 9 reward#k, you'll get a#e#bGolden Hammer#k#n, which increases the number of upgrades available on an equipment item by 1.

string.name: title
string.value: Day 10 as an Eco Mapleteer!

string.name: desc
string.value: Charge up Cosmic Green and use the #eGoing Green skill once#n each day to stamp your Strategy Journal for that day.\r\n#rFor your Day 10 reward#k, you'll get a pair of #b#eElven Glasses#n#k, which require Lv. 10 and has the following stats: #eATT/M. ATT +2, STR/DEX/INT/LUK +2, weapon DEF/Magic DEF +20, HP/MP +20, Accuracy/Avoidability +30, Charm +100#n.

string.name: title
string.value: Eco Mapleteers: Mission Complete!

string.name: desc
string.value: You've completed all missions as an Eco Mapleteer! Continue to keep Maple World green and safe place with the power of Going Green!

string.name: title
string.value: Legendary Memories 1 Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can leave a record in the Memory Journal after completing each day's Legendary Memories quest. You can obtain 20 Power Elixir as a reward for day 1.

string.name: title
string.value: Legendary Memories 2 Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can leave a record in the Memory Journal after completing each day's Legendary Memories quest. You can obtain 3 Virtue's Blessing as a reward for day 2.

string.name: title
string.value: Legendary Memories 3 Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can leave a record in the Memory Journal after completing each day's Legendary Memories quest. You can obtain 3 Legendary Mimir's Well Water as a reward for day 3.

string.name: title
string.value: Legendary Memories 4 Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can leave a record in the Memory Journal after completing each day's Legendary Memories quest. You can obtain 3 1.5X EXP Coupon as a reward for day 4.

string.name: title
string.value: Legendary Memories 5 Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can leave a record in the Memory Journal after completing each day's Legendary Memories quest. You can obtain 1 Advanced Equip Enhancement Scroll as a reward for day 5.

string.name: title
string.value: Legendary Memories 6 Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can leave a record in the Memory Journal after completing each day's Legendary Memories quest. You can obtain 1 Potential Scroll as a reward for day 6.

string.name: title
string.value: Legendary Memories 7 Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can leave a record in the Memory Journal after completing each day's Legendary Memories quest. You can obtain Legends Sweet and Tangy Earrings as a reward for day 7.

string.name: title
string.value: Legendary Memories Bonus+

string.name: desc
string.value: You will get a Memory Box for each day you complete starting on the 8th day. Inside, you'll find great special items!

string.name: title
string.value: Legendary Memories Bonus+

string.name: desc
string.value: You have conquered the Legendary Memories missions! Your memories will live on forever!

string.name: title
string.value: Monster Mop-Up Day 1!

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete each day's Making Memories quest to stamp your Summer Memory Journal for that day. \r\n#rFor your Day 1 reward#k, you'll get #e#b20 Power Elixirs#k#n, which completely restore your HP and MP!

string.name: title
string.value: Monster Mop-Up Day 2!

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete each day's Making Memories quest to stamp your Summer Memory Journal for that day. \r\n#rFor your Day 2 reward#k, you'll get #e#b3 Food Keeps You Warm buff coupons#k#n, which grant temporary boosts to your ATT, M. ATT, HP, MP, and Movement Speed!

string.name: title
string.value: Monster Mop-Up Day 3!

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete each day's Making Memories quest to stamp your Summer Memory Journal for that day. \r\n#rFor your Day 3 reward#k, you'll get a #e#bBling Bling Monkey#k#n and #e#b3 Legendary Mimir's Well Waters#k#n, which grant a certain percentage of EXP, regardless of your class and level!

string.name: title
string.value: Monster Mop-Up Day 4!

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete each day's Making Memories quest to stamp your Summer Memory Journal for that day. \r\n#rFor your Day 4 reward#k, you'll get #e#b3 1.5X EXP Coupons#k#n, which increases the amount of EXP you obtain by 1.5 for 1 hour!

string.name: title
string.value: Monster Mop-Up Day 5!

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete each day's Making Memories quest to stamp your Summer Memory Journal for that day. \r\n#rFor your Day 5 reward#k, you'll get an #e#bEquip Advanced Enhancement Scroll#k#n, which enhances a fully upgraded item!

string.name: title
string.value: Monster Mop-Up Day 6!

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete each day's Making Memories quest to stamp your Summer Memory Journal for that day. \r\n#rFor your Day 6 reward#k, you'll get a #e#bGolden Hammer#k#n, which increases the number of available upgrades on an equipment item by 1!

string.name: title
string.value: Monster Mop-Up Day 7!

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete each day's Making Memories quest to stamp your Summer Memory Journal for that day. \r\n#rFor your Day 7 reward#k, you'll get a pair of #e#bLegends Tangy Earrings#k#n (Lv. 75, Upgrades Available: 5, All Stats +3, DEF/M. DEF +50, Hidden Potential item) along with an awesome title!

string.name: title
string.value: Monster Mop-Up Complete!

string.name: desc
string.value: Complete each day's Making Memories quest to stamp your Summer Memory Journal for that day. \r\n#rAfter you've completed the quest for 7 days#k, you'll get a #e#bSummer Memory Box#k#n, which contains random special items, once per day starting on Day 8.

string.name: title
string.value: Remembering First Love - Day 1!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can check your attendance by completing the #rRemembering First Loves#k quest once a day.\r\nYou will receive one nifty #bTitle#k as a #bDay 1 reward#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Remembering First Love - Day 2!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can check your attendance by completing the #rRemembering First Loves#k quest once a day.\r\nYou will receive #b20 Power Elixirs#k which restores your HP and MP as a #bDay 2 reward#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Remembering First Love - Day 3!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can check your attendance by completing the #rRemembering First Loves#k quest once a day.\r\nYou will receive #b1 Scroll for Accessory for Stat 60%#k, which has a 60% chance to add +2 stat options to your accessory, as a #bDay 3 reward#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Remembering First Love - Day 4!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can check your attendance by completing the #rRemembering First Loves#k quest once a day.\r\nYou will receive #b1 Scroll for Accessory for ATT/Magic ATT 15%#k, which has a 15% chance to add +1 ATT/Magic ATT option to your accessory, as a #bDay 4 reward#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Remembering First Love - Day 5!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can check your attendance by completing the #rRemembering First Loves#k quest once a day.\r\nYou will receive #b2 Scrolls for Accessory for ATT/Magic ATT 15%#k, which have a 15% chance to add +1 ATT/Magic ATT option to your accessory, as a #bDay 5 reward#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Remembering First Love - Day 6!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can check your attendance by completing the #rRemembering First Loves#k quest once a day.\r\nYou will receive #b1 Chaos Scroll 60%#k which alters you equipment for better or worse as a #bDay 6 reward#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Remembering First Love - Day 7!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can check your attendance by completeing the #rRemembering First Loves#k quest once a day.\r\nYou will receive a face decoration item, #bSweet First Love#k, which comes with a Level 70 restriction, 3 available upgrades, +3 to all stats, and +50 Weapon/Magic DEF options, as a #bDay 7 reward#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Remembering First Love - Day 8!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can check your attendance by completing the #rRemembering First Loves#k quest once a day.\r\nYou will receive a #bPink Bean Chair#k, the comfiest chair in the whole world, as a #bDay 8 reward#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Where's Her First Love?

string.name: desc
string.value: You tried your best to help Cassandra find her first love, but there's still more to do! Don't leave her hanging now.

string.name: title
string.value: Tree Growing Complete!

string.name: desc
string.value: You made your day 7 entry in the Mini Christmas Tree Cultivation Journal \nand obtained an Advanced Equip Enhancement Scroll.

string.name: title
string.value: Rescue the Native Boys - 1 Time!

string.name: desc
string.value: You will get a request every 5th and 35th minute of the hour to #rgo on a rescue mission to save the Native Boys from fearsome beasts#k.\r\n#bParticipate in the rescue 1 time#k and you'll get #b30 Power Elixirs#k!

string.name: title
string.value: Rescue the Native Boys - 5 Times!

string.name: desc
string.value: You will get a request every 5th and 35th minute of the hour to #rgo on a rescue mission to save the Native Boys from fearsome beasts#k.\r\n#bParticipate in the rescue 5 times#k and you'll get the #bTribal Warcry buff#k and #ba noble title#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Rescue the Native Boys - 10 Times!

string.name: desc
string.value: You will get a request every 5th and 35th minute of the hour to #rgo on a rescue mission to save the Native Boys from fearsome beasts#k.\r\n#bParticipate in the rescue 10 times#k and you can select a #bweapon scroll for either ATT or M.ATT 60%#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Rescue the Native Boys - 15 Times!

string.name: desc
string.value: You will get a request every 5th and 35th minute of the hour to #rgo on a rescue mission to save the Native Boys from fearsome beasts#k.\r\n#bParticipate in the rescue 15 times#k and you'll get a #bNative Hog 30-Day Coupon#k and #ba powerful title#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Rescue the Native Boys - 20 Times!

string.name: desc
string.value: You will get a request every 5th and 35th minute of the hour to #rgo on a rescue mission to save the Native Boys from fearsome beasts#k.\r\n#bParticipate in the rescue 20 times#k and you'll get a #bMiraculous Chaos Scroll 60%#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Rescue the Native Boys - 25 Times!

string.name: desc
string.value: You will get a request every 5th and 35th minute of the hour to #rgo on a rescue mission to save the Native Boys from fearsome beasts#k.\r\n#bParticipate in the rescue 25 times#k and you'll get a #bNative Boy Belt#k and #ban awesome title#k.

string.name: title
string.value: Rescue the Native Boys - Complete!

string.name: desc
string.value: You went to rescue the Native Boys 25 times! There may be a few boys still trapped out there, so don't be afraid to let your inner hero out!

string.name: title
string.value: Challenging Gaga, Day 8!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can check your attendance once a day by beating Gaga's challenge. Check your attendance x days in a row to get a Rock-Paper-Scissors Trophy!

string.name: title
string.value: Challenging Gaga, Day 8!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can check your attendance once a day by beating Gaga's challenge. Check your attendance x days in a row to get a Rock-Paper-Scissors Trophy!

string.name: title
string.value: Knight of Virtue - 3rd Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r3 days#k to earn #e#b100 Power Elixirs#k#n, which fully restores your HP and MP.

string.name: title
string.value: Knight of Virtue - 4th Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r4 days#k to earn a #e#bSecret Recipe#k#n item, which gratns you 3 recipes for the Professions you've learned.

string.name: title
string.value: Knight of Virtue - 5th Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r5 days#k to earn #e#b3 Scrolls for Accessory for ATT/M. ATT 15%#k#n, which have a 15% change to grant an accessory +1 ATT/M. ATT.

string.name: title
string.value: Knight of Virtue - 6th Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r6 days#k to earn #e#b1 Nightmare Mount 10-Day Coupon#k#n, which allows you to use the Nightmare Mount skill for 10 days.

string.name: title
string.value: Knight of Virtue - 7th Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r7 days#k to earn #e#b3 Advanced Equip Enhancement Scrolls#k#n, which further enhance fully upgraded items.

string.name: title
string.value: Knight of Virtue - 8th Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r8 days#k to earn #e#b3 Special Potential Scrolls#k#n, which grant hidden potential to items that don't have any.

string.name: title
string.value: Knight of Virtue - 9th Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r9 days#k to earn #e#b3 Golden Hammers#k#n, which increase a piece of equipment's available upgrades by 1.

string.name: title
string.value: Knight of Virtue - 10th Day!

string.name: desc
string.value: To meet the attendance requirements, charge up the Stone of Virtue's power gauge and #euse the Virtue's Blessing skill once a day#n.\r\nDo this for #r10 days#k to earn a pair of #b#eShades of Virtuosity#n#k, which have a level requirement of 70 and the following stats: #eUpgrades Available: 5, STR/DEX/INT/LUK +4, Avoidability/Accuracy +30, and Weapon/Magic DEF +30#n.

string.name: title
string.value: Knight of Virtue - Mission Complete!

string.name: desc
string.value: You gave Maple World your best as a Knight of Virtue for a full ten days! You've completed this mission, but Maple World still needs you. Go get 'em!

string.name: title
string.value: Chill Thrill Day 3

string.name: desc
string.value: Take the Mesoranger Action Exam once a day to complete an attendance check.\r\nDo this for #r3 days#k to obtain #e#b50 Power Elixirs#k#n, which fully restore your HP and MP.

string.name: title
string.value: Chill Thrill Day 4

string.name: desc
string.value: Take the Mesoranger Entrance Exam once a day to complete an attendance check.\r\nDo this for #r4 days#k to obtain a #e#bNew Ice Crystal Face Paint#k#n.

string.name: title
string.value: Chill Thrill Day 5

string.name: desc
string.value: Take the Mesoranger Entrance Exam once a day to complete an attendance check.\r\nDo this for #r5 days#k to obtain an #e#bAdvanced Equip Enhancement Scroll#k#n.

string.name: title
string.value: Chill Thrill Day 6

string.name: desc
string.value: Take the Mesoranger Entrance Exam once a day to complete an attendance check.\r\nDo this for #r6 days#k to obtain a #e#bGolden Hammer#k#n.

string.name: title
string.value: Chill Thrill Day 7

string.name: desc
string.value: Take the Mesoranger Entrance Exam once a day to complete an attendance check.\r\nDo this for #r7 days#k to obtain a #e#bChaos Scroll#k#n.

string.name: title
string.value: Chill Thrill Day 8

string.name: desc
string.value: Take the Mesoranger Entrance Exam once a day to complete an attendance check.\r\nDo this for #r8 days#k to obtain a #e#bNew Rainbow Badge#k#n.

string.name: title
string.value: Chill Thrill completed!

string.name: desc
string.value: But the rewards are just starting to sizzle...

string.name: title
string.value: Mesoranger Participation Day 1

string.name: desc
string.value: Take the Mesoranger Entrance Exam once a day to complete an attendance check.\r\nDo this for #r1 day#k to obtain #e#b50 Power Elixirs#k#n, which fully restore your HP and MP.

string.name: title
string.value: Mesoranger Participation Day 2

string.name: desc
string.value: Take the Mesoranger Entrance Exam once a day to complete an attendance check.\r\nDo this for #r2 days#k to obtain a #e#bSpaceship mount#k#n.

string.name: title
string.value: Mesoranger Participation Day 3

string.name: desc
string.value: Take the Mesoranger Entrance Exam once a day to complete an attendance check.\r\nDo this for #r3 days#k to obtain a #e#bMesoranger Miraculous Chaos Scroll 60%#k#n.

string.name: title
string.value: Mesoranger Participation Day 4

string.name: desc
string.value: Take the Mesoranger Entrance Exam once a day to complete an attendance check.\r\nDo this for #r4 days#k to obtain a #e#bPendant of the Spirit#k#n.

string.name: title
string.value: Mesoranger Participation Day 5

string.name: desc
string.value: Take the Mesoranger Entrance Exam once a day to complete an attendance check.\r\nDo this for #r5 days#k to obtain a #e#bChaos Scroll 60%#k#n.

string.name: title
string.value: Mesoranger Participation Day 6

string.name: desc
string.value: Take the Mesoranger Entrance Exam once a day to complete an attendance check.\r\nDo this for #r6 days#k to obtain am #e#bAdvanced Potential Scroll#k#n.

string.name: title
string.value: Mesoranger Participation Day 7

string.name: desc
string.value: Take the Mesoranger Entrance Exam once a day to complete an attendance check.\r\nDo this for #r7 days#k to obtain a #e#bMesoranger Android Coupon#k#n.

string.name: title
string.value: Post Mesoranger Participation Check

string.name: desc
string.value: Take the Mesoranger Entrance Exam once a day to obtain #e#bCassandra's Magic and Unidentified Love Letter#k#n.

string.name: title
string.value: Post Mesoranger Participation Check

string.name: desc
string.value: Take the Mesoranger Entrance Exam once a day to obtain #e#bCassandra's Magic and Unidentified Love Letter#k#n.

string.name: title
string.value: 1회차 PC방 선물 받기

string.name: desc
string.value: #bPC방 출석체크 이벤트에 참여#k하여 마틸다에게서 선물을 받을 수 있다.\r\n PC방 출석 횟수 #r1회차 선물#k로 PC방 랜덤 변신물약을 얻을 수 있다.

string.name: title
string.value: 2회차 PC방 선물 받기

string.name: desc
string.value: #bPC방 출석체크 이벤트에 참여#k하여 마틸다에게서 선물을 받을 수 있다.\r\n PC방 출석 횟수 #r2회차 선물#k로 파워 엘릭서를 얻을 수 있다.

string.name: title
string.value: 3회차 PC방 선물 받기

string.name: desc
string.value: #bPC방 출석체크 이벤트에 참여#k하여 마틸다에게서 선물을 받을 수 있다.\r\n PC방 출석 횟수 #r3회차 선물#k로 스페셜 정령의 펜던트를 얻을 수 있다.

string.name: title
string.value: 4회차 PC방 선물 받기

string.name: desc
string.value: #bPC방 출석체크 이벤트에 참여#k하여 마틸다에게서 선물을 받을 수 있다.\r\n PC방 출석 횟수 #r4회차 선물#k로 럭키데이 주문서를 얻을 수 있다.

string.name: title
string.value: 5회차 PC방 선물 받기

string.name: desc
string.value: #bPC방 출석체크 이벤트에 참여#k하여 마틸다에게서 선물을 받을 수 있다.\r\n PC방 출석 횟수 #r5회차 선물#k로 놀라운 혼돈의 주문서 60%를 얻을 수 있다.

string.name: title
string.value: 6회차 PC방 선물 받기

string.name: desc
string.value: #bPC방 출석체크 이벤트에 참여#k하여 마틸다에게서 선물을 받을 수 있다.\r\n PC방 출석 횟수 #r6회차 선물#k로 고급 장비강화 주문서를 얻을 수 있다.

string.name: title
string.value: 7회차 PC방 선물 받기

string.name: desc
string.value: #bPC방 출석체크 이벤트에 참여#k하여 마틸다에게서 선물을 받을 수 있다.\r\n PC방 출석 횟수 #r7회차 선물#k로 금빛 각인의 인장을 얻을 수 있다.

string.name: title
string.value: PC방 출석체크 한바퀴 완료!

string.name: desc
string.value: PC방 출석체크 7회차의 선물을 모두 받은 당신! 다시 1회차로 돌아가서 계속 선물을 받아보자.\r\n#r이벤트기간 동안 계속 반복됩니다.#k

string.name: title
string.value: 영농 일기 1일째!

string.name: desc
string.value: 가가에게서 받는 첫번째 꿀수박 화분을 잘 키워서 가가표 꿀수박을 획득하면 하루 1번씩 꿀수박 영농 일기를 쓸 수 있다.\r\n1일째 보상으로 #b영농 후계자 칭호#k를 얻을 수 있다.

string.name: title
string.value: 영농 일기 3일째!

string.name: desc
string.value: 가가에게서 받는 첫번째 꿀수박 화분을 잘 키워서 가가표 꿀수박을 획득하면 하루 1번씩 꿀수박 영농 일기를 쓸 수 있다.\r\n3일째 보상으로 #b파워 엘릭서 100개#k를 얻을 수 있다.

string.name: title
string.value: 영농 일기 5일째!

string.name: desc
string.value: 가가에게서 받는 첫번째 꿀수박 화분을 잘 키워서 가가표 꿀수박을 획득하면 하루 1번씩 꿀수박 영농 일기를 쓸 수 있다.\r\n5일째 보상으로 다른 대륙의 원하는 도시로 이동시켜 주는 #b대륙 이동 주문서#k를 얻을 수 있다.

string.name: title
string.value: 영농 일기 7일째!

string.name: desc
string.value: 가가에게서 받는 첫번째 꿀수박 화분을 잘 키워서 가가표 꿀수박을 획득하면 하루 1번씩 꿀수박 영농 일기를 쓸 수 있다.\r\n7일째 보상으로 #b50레벨 이상, 공격력/마력+5, 물리/마법방어력+50, 이동속도+10, 점프력+8, 30일 기간제 #r꿀수박 목걸이#k가 들어 있는 보관함을 얻을 수 있다.

string.name: title
string.value: 영농 일기 작성 완료!

string.name: desc
string.value: 가가에게서 받은 영농 일기를 마지막 페이지까지 모두 작성하였다. 매일 꿀수박 화분을 키우고 가가표 꿀수박의 신비한 힘으로 무한 사냥을 즐기자!
